result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Diante Kieth Jacobs

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Diante Kieth Jacobs.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Final Pretrial held. Court holds colloquy with parties.  Case remains in trial posture.  Due to interpreter availability, Court rescheduled the Jury Trial to 1/25/2023.
Case remains calendared for Jury Trial, Branch 13.
Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.

Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Diante Kieth Jacobs.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a final pretrial. ASL Interpreter is unable to appear to interpret for the defendant. Court adjourns the final pretrial. Case remains calendared in the Reserve Branch in room 508CH.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as ASL interpreters:  Sandy Peplinski & Jenny Buechner
*
Status conference held.   Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.   Case adjourned for final pretrial and for jury trial in Branch 13.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Based on defendant's appearance in Court, Court orders stayed bench warrant cancelled. Due to technical difficulties with Court's zoom account, Court was unable to accommodate ASL interpreter's appearance by zoom.   
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  
 All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.
Status conference scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Diante Kieth Jacobs appeared by video means with Attorney. ASL Interpreter appeared but was not needed. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Calendar call on June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs not in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: MK. ASL Interpreter Michael Maffucci appears. 
Case in Court for pretrial conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. Case remains calendared in Br. 37.  Calendar call scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Discharge Report received and filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with C.M.R.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Sworn as American Sign Language interpreter:  Nicole Keeler (asst. Maria Kielma and Amy Fryman)

Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in court with attorney Paige Aleece Styler.  Defendant Diante Kieth Jacobs in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Diante Kieth Jacobs appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Diante Kieth Jacobs
Current: 1557 S 10th St, Milwaukee, WI 53204   (Effective: 04-20-2022)
Prior: 6532 West Carmen Street, Milwaukee, WI 53218
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
